EarthquakeHub Backend API

POST /accounts/register

Create a new account given user information

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Registration successful

  • 400 Bad Request – Registration failed due to existing username or email

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /accounts/authenticate

Return a JWT in exchange for username, password, & role

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Authentication successful. ! Varies depending on account role !

  • 400 Bad Request – Authentication failed due to various reasons

  • 401 Unauthorized – Authentication failed due to wrong password

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

Response Headers:

  • Set-Cookie – If role is citizen or admin, JWT is returned as cookie

POST /accounts/signout

Clear citizen’s accessToken in cookie

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Sign out successful

  • 403 Forbidden – When no token is present in sent cookie

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

Response Headers:

  • Set-Cookie – This endpoints clears the accessToken cookie

POST /accounts/verify-sensor-token

Tell a brgy whether a sensor’s JWT came from this server

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Sensor verification successful

  • 400 Bad Request – Sensor verification failed due to invalid request or internal error

  • 403 Forbidden – Sensor verification failed due to token-related issues

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /accounts/profile

Return user information if accessToken is in cookie

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successfully added device to user account

  • 400 Bad Request – Device NETWORK and STATION codes are already used

  • 403 Forbidden – When no token is present in sent cookie

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /device/add

Add a device to the user’s account

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – User profile information sent as payload

  • 400 Bad Request – Account doesn’t exist

  • 403 Forbidden – When no token is present in sent cookie

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /device/link

Bind sensor’s MAC address and streamId to the user’s device record

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Device-account linking successful

  • 400 Bad Request – Bad request

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /device/all

Return all added (not necessarily linked) devices with their location

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Success response with device locations

  • 400 Bad Request – Error response when no devices are found in the database.

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /device/my-devices

Return list of devices belonging to the authenticated (citizen) user

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Success response with device locations

  • 403 Forbidden – When no token is present in sent cookie

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /device/status

Return the status of a specified device

Query Parameters:

  • network (string) – The network code of the device (Required)

  • station (string) – The station code of the device (Required)

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Successful response with device network, station, status, and statusSince sent back as payload

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /eq-events

Get recorded seismic events in the network within a specific time range

Query Parameters:

  • startTime (string) – The start time of the events (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S) (Required)

  • endTime (string) – The start time of the events (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S) (Required)

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – EQ events acquired successfully.

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

GET /messaging

SSE endpoint to stream SC_PICK or SC_EVENT messages to the client.

  • This endpoint streams events to the client using Server-Sent Events (SSE).

  • The endpoint uses the text/event-stream content type.

  • Events are sent as STRINGS in the format: event: <event_name>ndata: <event_obj>\id: <timestamp>nn.

  • event can be either SC_PICK or SC_EVENT

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – OK

POST /messaging/restricted/new-event

Add new EQevent as message in SSE, entry in DB, and notif to subscribed clients.

!! Access to this endpoint is restricted to trusted network only, this is done via the NGINX reverse-proxy (in deployment environment).

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Event added successfully

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /messaging/restricted/new-pick

Add new PICK as message to SSE.

!! Access to this endpoint is restricted to trusted network only, this is done via the NGINX reverse-proxy (in deployment environment).

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Pick received successfully

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error

POST /notifications/subscribe

Subscribe to web-push notifications.

This endpoint should be accessed using client browser’s webpush API

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK – Subscription already exists.

  • 201 Created – Subscription created successfully.

  • 400 Bad Request – Bad request or internal error such as DB not accessible.

  • 500 Internal Server Error – Internal server error
